Hi Everyone

I'm a well-rounded web developer with experience in back-end and DevOps, but my true expertise lies in front-end development and functional programming. My journey in programming began way back in 2006 when I started tinkering with RPG Maker, using tools like Ruby, alongside HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, to update my MySpace page. Between 2008 and 2012, I earned my System Integration Degree from the University of Central Paran√° (UCP). Presently, I hold the position of Front-end Staff Engineer at a Financial Group. At this point in my career, my primary focus is Front-end development and WebAssembly (WASM). I firmly believe that WebAssembly and Rust present excellent opportunities for skill enhancement.

Over the years, I've had the privilege of working across various industries, spanning agro-business companies, car rental services, food delivery apps, e-commerce businesses, and marketplaces. My experience has exposed me to a diverse set of technologies, including Style-guides, Microservices, micro frontends, Single Page Applications (SPAs), Backends for Frontends (BFF), and many more.

In terms of personal traits, I consider my curiosity, unquenchable thirst for knowledge, and unwavering sense of responsibility as the driving forces behind my success. I thrive on the excitement of learning new things and thrive on the challenges of working on diverse projects. Above all, I hold the belief that the most crucial aspect of any project is choosing the right technology based on its requirements, rather than blindly following the latest trends.

Thank you for taking the time to read this, and I wish you all a fantastic day.
